# File lib/celerity/elements/table.rb, line 13
    def locate
      super
      if @object # cant call assert_exists here, as an exists? method call will fail
        @rows = @object.getRows
        @cells = []
        @rows.each do |row|
          row.getCells.each do |c|
            @cells << c
          end
        end
      end

      @object
    end
